summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a final visual document related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes an attachment titled 'Ghislaine_Maxwell_Visual_DRAFT_v5.pdf' and appears to be formatted for printing, likely for public affairs or press office use.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The attached document is specifically about her, indicating she is a central figure in the case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 30, 2020, from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
It references a final visual document draft (version 5) focused on Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email is addressed to the Public Affairs Press Office, suggesting the document was prepared for public or media distribution.
The attachment is named 'Ghislaine_Maxwell_Visual_DRAFT_v5.pdf', indicating it is a visual aid or presentation about Maxwell.
The document is part of the EFTA00016156 file in the Epstein case data set.
